content: like a 1 x 1 rib for sock cuffs bind off using jeny s surprisingly stretchy bind off for 1 x 1 rib reverse yo k1 pass yo over knit stitch then yo p1 pass yo over purl stitch then pass the second stitch on the needle over the first one repeat to end an afterthought heel - yarn by fab funky fibres i believe in the finishing impossible colourway weave in ends repeat for second sock and voila © tanis fiber arts 2019 all rights reserved pattern for personal use only www tanisfiberarts com
